lines.text: Are you sure we're not in a looney bin? Sometimes I think we're in a goddamn looney bin!
I am your friend. I have chocolate.
Ol' Barker might just come down here and shoot my balls off.
Never in the U.S. have we asked for anything back. It would screw up the bookkeeping.
Wattsberg, do you love your commanding officer?
That's fine, because I love you, too.

[to a wounded, one-eyed Viet Cong scout]
I'm going home, Charlie... if they'll let me.
